스마트 TV.summary: 구글 검색 결과에서 중간 위치(7, 9위)에 언급되었으며, Perplexity 분석에서는 주요 경쟁사 중 하나로 높은 가시성을 보임. 특히 OLED 분야에서 긍정적으로 평가됨.

프리미엄 가전.summary: 구글 결과에서 최상위(2위)에 직접 언급되어 높은 가시성을 확보했으나, Perplexity AI 분석에서는 삼성에 비해 낮은 가시성(2위)을 보였으며 중립적인 감성을 가짐.

에어컨.summary: 구글 검색 결과가 제공되지 않았고, Perplexity AI 분석에서도 브랜드 언급이 전혀 감지되지 않아 이 키워드에 대한 가시성은 매우 낮음.

| **Sony**      | OLED, X1 Ultimate      | Highest consumer trust, excellent color accuracy and image processing | Premium pricing[2]                      |
| **Samsung**   | QLED, Tizen OS         | High brightness, vibrant colors, wide app support, smart home integration | QLED can have less deep blacks than OLED[2][5] |

| **Panasonic** | OLED, 4K HDR           | Cinematic experience, professional calibration | Limited U

presence[2]                |
| **Toshiba**   | Fire TV Integration    | Affordable, seamless access to Amazon content | Fewer premium features[2]               |
| **Sharp**     | AQUOS, smart features  | Color/contrast enhancement, energy efficiency | Lower market share[2]                   |
| **Vizio**     | Affordable 4K, SmartCast| Value pricing, broad streaming support | Picture quality may lag behind premium brands[2] |

---

**Top-Rated Models (2025):**

- **LG G5 OLED:** Exceptional color performance, deep blacks, but picture quality can vary with settings[5]
- **LG C5 OLED:** Strong in bright rooms; Samsung S90F OLED preferred for vivid colors/gaming[5]
- **Samsung S85F OLED:** Most affordable QD-OLED; better color than LG B4 OLED, but LG is more accurate and versatile in different regions[5]
- **Customer Trust:** According to 2025 consumer ratings, Sony leads in trust and perceived quality, with Samsung and LG also highly rated[2]
